argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ z x e. y |
| 2 |  | #P_elequ1 | |- ( z = x -> ( z e. y <-> x e. y ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_equsex | |- ( E. z ( z = x /\ z e. y ) <-> x e. y ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_bicomi | |- ( x e. y <-> E. z ( z = x /\ z e. y ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ cleljust .  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
